item.description:
BalletRox
Regular Price: $35.00
BosTix Price: $25.00
Anthony Williams' Urban Nutcracker 12/04/09 To 12/06/09

"You'll go nuts for Urban Nutcracker...Tchaikovsky's great ballet The Nutcracker was meant to be a dance party, right? So why not invite Sir Duke, bring a bunch of friends from the block and have a real party? In a nutshell, that's the premise behind BalletRox's Urban Nutcracker." - The Boston Herald

Anthony Williams' Urban Nutcracker, the holiday dance classic with an inner city edge, features the BalletRox dance company and celebrates its seventh anniversary this December. It fuses ballet, swing, hip hop, and urban tap with the classical score of Tchaikovsky and the pulsating beat of Duke Ellington while showcasing an incredible array of set designs and costumes by Rebecca Cross and celebrating the rich talent and diversity of Boston's urban communities and children.

12/5 7:30 PM - Seating available in the Middle Orchestra: NOW $25.00
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Box Office or earlier for dinner-TBD
item.name: Urban Nutcracker at John Hancock Hall
